summary: HomePage.tsx was updated to a deeper ocean/underwater gradient theme and retains the header navigation buttons wired to the existing onNavigate callback. The diff is truncated around the feature box section, so the exact bottom 3-box content/CTA labels and responsive layout requirements cannot be fully verified from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a bottom section on the Home page containing 3 boxes side-by-side (responsive) with the exact feature titles, descriptions, and CTA labels provided by the user; each CTA must navigate to the appropriate existing page.
missing_requirements.reason: The HomePage.tsx diff is truncated before the feature boxes are shown, so there is not enough evidence to confirm the exact required titles/descriptions/CTA labels, the responsive 3-across-to-stacked layout behavior, and that each CTA navigates correctly to onNavigate('map'|'calculate'|'comment').

hallucinated_features.description: Added a hamburger (Menu) button in the header with no onClick handler shown.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only required preserving existing top navigation behavior; it did not request adding a (potentially non-functional) hamburger/menu control.
